events.text: Options event sheet is not included, that needs to be loaded from somewhere
Should be counted for level load

parameters.text: "FPS: " & fps & newline & "CPU: " & left(str(cpuutilisation*100),4) & "%" & newline & "OBJ: " & objectcount & newline & "Weapon 1: " & function.Call("PLR_GetWeaponName",PlayerData.Weapon_1) & ", " & PlayerData.Weapon_1 & newline & "Weapon 2: " & function.Call("PLR_GetWeaponName",PlayerData.Weapon_2) & ", " & PlayerData.Weapon_2 & newline & "Weapon 3: " & function.Call("PLR_GetWeaponName",PlayerData.Weapon_3) & ", " & PlayerData.Weapon_3 & newline & "Magazine: " & Weapon_Player.MagLeft & "/" & Weapon_Player.Magsize & newline & "Light: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Light  & newline & "Medium: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Medium  & newline & "Heavy: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Heavy  & newline & "Shells: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Shell  & newline & "Explosive: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Explosive & "Special: " & Weapon_Player.Ammo_Special & newline & "Coyote Time: " & Player.Timer.CurrentTime("CoyoteTime") & newline & "Aim Angle: " & round(Player_Aim.Angle)

"Name: " & Weapon_Player.Name & newline & "Type:" & Weapon_Player.Type & newline & "Mode:" & Weapon_Player.Mode & newline & "Ammo Type:" & Weapon_Player.AmmoType & newline & "Damage: " & Weapon_Player.Damage & newline & "Interval: " & Weapon_Player.Interval & newline & "Interval Current:" & Weapon_Player.IntervalCurrent & newline & "Knockback:" & Weapon_Player.Knockback & newline & "Spread: " & Weapon_Player.Spread & newline & "Reload:" & Weapon_Player.Reload & newline & "Handling: " & Weapon_Player.Handling & newline & "Penetration:" & Weapon_Player.Penetration & newline & "Shot Count:" & Weapon_Player.ShotCount & newline & "BurstCount: " & Weapon_Player.BurstCount
